clinical_study.brief_title: Huaier Granule for Prevention of Recurrence and Metastasis of Hepatocarcinoma Following Local Ablation
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Prospective Cohort Study Investigating Huaier Granule for Prevention of Recurrence and Metastasis of Hepatocarcinoma Following Local Ablation
clinical_study.source: Cancer Institute and Hospital, Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the efficacy and safety of Huaier Granule for Prevention of Recurrence and Metastasis of Hepatocarcinoma following Local Ablation

detailed_description.textblock: A multicenter, prospective cohort study investigating Huaier Granule for Prevention of Recurrence and Metastasis of Hepatocarcinoma following Local Ablation，to evaluate the efficacy and safety

primary_outcome.description: PFS was defined as the duration of time from start of treatment to time of disease progression.

secondary_outcome.description: RFS was defined as the duration of time from start of treatment to time of disease recurrence .

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Time from baseline to relapse (up to 96 weeks)
secondary_outcome.description: TTR was defined as the time from shart of treatment to disease recurrence.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Time from baseline to death (up to 96 weeks)
secondary_outcome.description: OS was defined as the time from start to death from any cause or last patient last visit.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Quality of Life (QOL)
secondary_outcome.description: Quality of Life (QOL) were measured using supplemental quality of life questions. Item score range（12 items）: 1 (worst symptom) to 5 (no symptom). Change: score at 96 weeks minus score at baseline.
An AE was any untoward medical occurrence in a participant who received study drug without regard to possibility of causal relationship.

An SAE was an AE resulting in any of the following outcomes or deemed significant for any other reason: death; initial or prolonged inpatient hospitalization; life-threatening experience (immediate risk of dying); persistent or significant disability/incapacity; congenital anomaly.

arm_group.description: All treatments of patients after Local Ablation are prescribed by a physician on the basis of usual clinical practice.Patients who maybe receive Huaier Granule are as observation group 1
All treatments of patients after Local Ablation are prescribed by a physician on the basis of usual clinical practice.Patients who maybe not receive Huaier Granule are as observation group 2

study_pop.textblock: Hepatocellular Carcinoma patients after Local Ablation
